docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs2 For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout 1 2 3 4 mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs2

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Commands

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Minecraft構築memo JE/BE両方から参加できるサーバを建てたい OS:CentOS7.9 java:java17 directory:/mnt/xvdb/minecraft/ 1.java install 1 yum -y install java-17-openjdk java-17-openjdk-devel 2.purpurmc install purpur download purpurmc からjarファイルをDL 参考： Minecraftのサーバーの種類まとめ purpurmc start 1 java -Xms1G -Xmx2G -jar /mnt/xvdb/minecraft/purpur-1.18.2-1626.jar nogui 参考： Minecraftサーバーにはメモリをどれくらい割り当てるべきなのか 起動shell ※権限とかは適当に変える 1 2 #!/bin/sh java -Xms1G -Xmx2G -jar /mnt/xvdb/minecraft/purpur-1.18.2-1626.jar nogui 初回起動後(必ず失敗する)に[/mnt/xvdb/minecraft/eula.txt]を編集 [eula=false]を[eula=true]に変更 1 2 3 4 #By changing the setting below to TRUE you are indicating your agreement to our EULA (https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula). #You also agree that tacos are tasty, and the best food in the world. #Mon May 23 09:11:23 CST 2022 eula=true ←falseからtrueへ変更 3.GeyserMC/Floodgate install 参考： 【プラグイン紹介】統合版とJava版でクロスプレイが出来るプラグイン【GeyserMC】 以下2ファイルをpluginsディレクトリに保存する GeyserMC からjarファイル(Geyser-Spigot.jar)をDL Floodgate からjarファイル(floodgate-spigot.jar)をDL 1 2 3 cd /mnt/xvdb/minecraft/plugins wget https://ci.opencollab.dev//job/GeyserMC/job/Geyser/job/master/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/bootstrap/spigot/target/Geyser-Spigot.jar wget https://ci.opencollab.dev/job/GeyserMC/job/Floodgate/job/master/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/spigot/target/floodgate-spigot.jar 1度serverを起動しpluginsフォルダ内GeyserMCの[config.yml]編集する [auth-type=online]を[auth-type=floodgate]に変更 1 2 3 4 5 6 (snip) # Authentication type. Can be offline, online, or floodgate (see https://github.com/GeyserMC/Geyser/wiki/Floodgate). # For plugin versions, it's recommended to keep the `address` field to "auto" so Floodgate support is automatically configured. # If Floodgate is installed and `address:` is set to "auto", then "auth-type: floodgate" will automatically be used. auth-type: floodgate ←onlineから変更 (snip) 4.そのほか port open TCPの25565とUDPの19132
docs.title: Minecraft構築memo

docs.text: 1 java -Xms1G -Xmx2G -jar /mnt/xvdb/minecraft/purpur-1.18.2-1626.jar nogui 参考： Minecraftサーバーにはメモリをどれくらい割り当てるべきなのか 起動shell ※権限とかは適当に変える 1 2 #!/bin/sh java -Xms1G -Xmx2G -jar /mnt/xvdb/minecraft/purpur-1.18.2-1626.jar nogui 初回起動後(必ず失敗する)に[/mnt/xvdb/minecraft/eula.txt]を編集 [eula=false]を[eula=true]に変更 1 2 3 4 #By changing the setting below to TRUE you are indicating your agreement to our EULA (https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula). #You also agree that tacos are tasty, and the best food in the world. #Mon May 23 09:11:23 CST 2022 eula=true ←falseからtrueへ変更
docs.title: purpurmc start

docs.text: 参考： 【プラグイン紹介】統合版とJava版でクロスプレイが出来るプラグイン【GeyserMC】 以下2ファイルをpluginsディレクトリに保存する GeyserMC からjarファイル(Geyser-Spigot.jar)をDL Floodgate からjarファイル(floodgate-spigot.jar)をDL 1 2 3 cd /mnt/xvdb/minecraft/plugins wget https://ci.opencollab.dev//job/GeyserMC/job/Geyser/job/master/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/bootstrap/spigot/target/Geyser-Spigot.jar wget https://ci.opencollab.dev/job/GeyserMC/job/Floodgate/job/master/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/spigot/target/floodgate-spigot.jar 1度serverを起動しpluginsフォルダ内GeyserMCの[config.yml]編集する [auth-type=online]を[auth-type=floodgate]に変更 1 2 3 4 5 6 (snip) # Authentication type. Can be offline, online, or floodgate (see https://github.com/GeyserMC/Geyser/wiki/Floodgate). # For plugin versions, it's recommended to keep the `address` field to "auto" so Floodgate support is automatically configured. # If Floodgate is installed and `address:` is set to "auto", then "auth-type: floodgate" will automatically be used. auth-type: floodgate ←onlineから変更 (snip)
